Faculty
Mukulika Maity
Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Madras
mukulika@iiitd.ac.in
Google Scholar
Received her M.Tech+ Ph.D. dual degree from the computer science department of the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay in 2016. She received B.E. in 2010 in the computer science department of Bengal Engineering and Science University, Shibpur.
